events.body: The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers. ### Code Coverage & Benchmarks For details see: https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/34092. ### Reviews See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process. | Type | Reviewers | | ---- | --------- | | ACK | [hebasto](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34092#pullrequestreview-3588583767), [brunoerg](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34092#pullrequestreview-3588777441), [janb84](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34092#pullrequestreview-3589334408), [w0xlt](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34092#pullrequestreview-3589401465), [waketraindev](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34092#issuecomment-3667331991) | If your review is incorrectly listed, please copy-paste <!--meta-tag:bot-skip--> into the comment that the bot should ignore. ### LLM Linter (âœ¨ experimental) Possible typos and grammar issues: - Bitcoin Core daemon version v30.1.0 bitcoind -> Bitcoin Core daemon bitcoind version v30.1.0 [word order is ungrammatical as written; reordering clarifies that "bitcoind" is the daemon name associated with the version] 2025-12-17
